---
id: resume-rtc-streams
title: "ResumeRTCStreams"
description: "Call this API to batch resume RTC stream publishing. You can batch resume Stream IDs that are forbidden from publishing to the RTC media service. Used together with batch forbidding RTC stream publishing."
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/media-service/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>ResumeRTCStreams</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to batch resume RTC stream publishing. You can batch resume Stream IDs that are forbidden from publishing to the RTC media service. Used together with batch forbidding RTC stream publishing.
<Note title="Rate Limit">For all rooms under the same AppID: 20 times/second (test environment: 5 times/second)</Note>

<Note title="Note">
In the test environment (see the IsTest common parameter description for details), the Stream ID must be prefixed with "zegotest-AppId-". For example, if the Stream ID is "test" and the AppId is "123456789" in the test environment, the Stream ID should be "zegotest-123456789-test".
</Note>

## Request
